body_html:
I think the tf.matrix_inverse() is already implemeted on GPU.

I run this benchmark on my laptop with 1060 Ti 6GB and get the following results:

time elapsed tf.matrix_inverse: 0:00:00.561071
time elapsed sp.linalg.inv: 0:00:02.610363

body:
I think the tf.matrix_inverse() is already implemeted on GPU.

I run this benchmark on my laptop with 1060 Ti 6GB and get the following results:

time elapsed tf.matrix_inverse: 0:00:00.561071
time elapsed sp.linalg.inv:     0:00:02.610363
